reviewText: CHARLOTTE RAMPLING & SIMONE SIFNORET off against each other --- wonderful to bring these two generations off against each other in an 'old fashioned' crime plot --- leave it to the French to put the women in charge against a gang of fumbling men.
Unfortunately a lot of the story makes little to no sense by today's standards. Still, fun to see a stunning Charlotte Rampling and old timers like Simone Signoret and Edwige Feuillere.
